text: Stewartstown is a village in Northern Ireland, in the United Kingdom. It is 5 miles from Cookstown and 7 miles from Dungannon. ==Population facts== On 29 April 2001 the United Kingdom government had a census and found that there were 608 people living in Stewartstown. They also found that: *25.3% of people in Stewartstown were over 16 years old and 14.8% were over 60 years old *46.7% were male and 53.3% were female *72.9% were from a Roman Catholic background and 26.2% were from a Protestant background *5.1% of people aged 16â€“74 were no jobNI Neighbourhood Information Service ==References== Category:Villages in Northern Ireland
title: Stewartstown
